title: Katarushi: Nonoka no Kunisaki Fushigi Tanbou
original_name: かたるし ～ののかの国東不思議探訪～
sinopse: In the spiritual land of Kunisaki, high school freshman Nonoka Kibe runs a consultation office for the supernatural. As the only one who can see them, her goal is to aid in any way she can, along with her oni friend, Chibiki, and her Yamaha TownMate.
